title: Average U.S. teen Twitter follower count 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Share of respondents has increased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 0_to_100 to 201_to_300, and lastly slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 301_and_more and Don't_know.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 44.0 was reported at Year Don't_know
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 5.0 was reported at Year 201_to_300

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Share of respondents has increased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 0_to_100 to 201_to_300, and lastly slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 301_and_more and Don't_know.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 44.0 was reported at Year Don't_know
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 5.0 was reported at Year 201_to_300
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 201_to_300 to 301_and_more, and lastly, increased by 4.4 times from Year 301_and_more to Don't_know.
